RelationshipFilter.description: The relationship filter to apply in a graph query

or.description: A list of disjunctive criterion for the filter. (or operation to combine filters)

criteria.description: Deprecated! A list of conjunctive criterion for the filter. If "or" field is provided, then this field is ignored.

direction.description: The relationship direction between two nodes in a graph query

ConjunctiveCriterion.description: A list of criterion and'd together.

and.description: A list of and criteria the filter applies to the query

Criterion.description: A criterion for matching a field with given value

field.description: The name of the field that the criterion refers to

value.description: The value of the intended field

values.description:
Values. one of which the intended field should match
Note, if values is set, the above "value" field will be ignored

condition.description: The condition for the criterion, e.g. EQUAL, START_WITH

negated.description: Whether the condition should be negated

Condition.description: The matching condition in a filter criterion

RelationshipDirection.description: The relationship direction in a relationship filter
